title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Bengio worked at the IDIAP Research Institute and École Polytechnique Fédrale de Lausanne in Switzerland, from 1999 to 2007.

title: Former Researchers — EN - Idiap Research Institute — EN
snippet: In January 2020, he founded OptimalAI, a company which automate AI decision-making for industry. Samy BENGIO During 8 years, Samy was the head of the Machine Learning research group at Idiap.

title: Samy Bengio
snippet: Samy Bengio (PhD in computer science, University of Montreal, 1993) was a research scientist at Google from 2007 to 2021. Prior to that, he was senior researcher in statistical machine learning at IDIAP Research Institute, where he supervised ...
